answer:
In BC, influenza (flu) vaccines are not typically available until October/November each year. In September, the Find an Influenza (Flu) Clinic locator is active. You could contact locations close to you and ask if they have influenza vaccines in stock.
Immunization Nurse
question: We are away for the month of October and hoping to get the flu vaccine now, does anyone have any stock in Vancouver, B.C.
question_variation_0: do any stock companies have stocks in canada
question_variation_2: do stocks have stock in Vancouver BC
